DataElement.preferredName: Radiation Field Kidney Abnormality Modification Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether there was a modification to the targeted area of the body exposed to radiation during radiation therapy as a result of an abnormality to one of the two organs that excrete the urine.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a modification to the targeted area of the body exposed to radiation during radiation therapy as a result of an abnormality to one of the two organs that excrete the urine.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The area of the body exposed to radiation during radiation therapy.

Concepts.definition: The area of the body exposed to radiation during radiation therapy.

Property.preferredDefinition: One of the two organs that excrete the urine. The kidneys are bean-shaped organs (about 11 cm long, 5 cm wide, and 3 cm thick) lying on either side of the vertebral column, posterior to the peritoneum, about opposite the twelfth thoracic and first three lumbar vertebrae. SYN ren, nephros.:A condition that differs from the usual physical or mental state.:Modification; the act of making something different.

Concepts.definition: One of the two bean-shaped organs located on each side of the spine in the retroperitoneum. The right kidney is located below the liver and the left kidney below the diaphragm. The kidneys filter and secrete metabolic products and minerals from the blood, thus maintaining homeostasis. On the superior pole of each kidney there is an adrenal gland. Each kidney and adrenal gland is surrounded by fat.
A condition that differs from the usual physical or mental state.
Modification; the act of making something different.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the patient have any ren
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have any renal abnormalities that would require modification of radiation fields?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have renal abnormalities, such as pelvic kidney, horseshoe kidney, or renal transplantation, which would require modification of the radiation fields?
